remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別具有下列的預設屬性值。The class has the following default property values. |屬性Property|預設值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||1.2.840.113549.1.7.1 （資料） 長度： 01.2.840.113549.1.7.1 (data)Length: zero| ||卸離狀態： `false` CMS/PKCS #7 訊息，以及簽章中的資訊會包含已簽署內容。Detached state: `false` The content that is signed is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information.| 預設值簽署人是 SubjectIdentifierType.IssuerAndSerialNumber。The default for signers is SubjectIdentifierType.IssuerAndSerialNumber. 如果已卸離的狀態是`false`（預設值），以及簽章資訊 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息中包含已簽署的內容。If the detached state is `false` (the default), the signed content is included in the CMS/PKCS #7 message along with the signature information. 如果已卸離的狀態是`true`，無法解碼 S/MIME 訊息的用戶端仍然可以看到訊息的內容，如果會個別傳送。If the detached state is `true`, clients that cannot decode S/MIME messages can still see the content of the message if it is sent separately. 這可能會很有用的封存的應用程式，以封存訊息內容是否可以驗證訊息傳送者的真實性。This may be useful in an archiving application that archives message content whether the message sender can be verified for authenticity.
